sentence.Network_en: When the time of his departure approached, he resolved to chant a Te Deum pontifically.
sentence.Network_cn: 到了快离开时, 他决计用主教的仪式做一场大弥撒.

list.abs: 斯坦福：圣... ... 18: 瞧，我站起来了，作品１４５ For lo,I raise up,Op. 145 1: 赞美你，主啊 Te deum laudamus 2: 降福经 Benedictus.
